data.text: @roshnirebecca May we ask which channel you have contacted for cancel and refund?
@rush2krrish @MoCA_GoI Please send us the Direct Message as we started following you.
@roshnirebecca Are you currently in Frankfurt?

@rahulvig261 If you contact them via email, please provide the information in the email as follows
1. Full name
2. Reservation code with 6 digits
3. Travel date
4. Your route
5. Your request

@rush2krrish We would like to inform you that the investigation process takes some time. If there are any updates, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible. We are really sorry for your inconvenience.

@Tejas44309997 We would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket. Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket.
@rahulvig261 The relevant departments will speed up the investigation and get back to you as soon as possible.

@changalang42 Please be informed that, normally, the process of investigation does take some time. If there are any updates or progress towards this issue, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible.
@changalang42 Greetings, we are sorry for the inconvenience. We suggest that you can visit https://t.co/PsVOxHZ1ir for more information.

@varamfer Due to the large volume of visitors, the waiting period may be slower than usual. We apologize for any inconvenience caused by this opportunity. The relevant departments will speed up the investigation and get back to you as soon as possible.

@Tejas44309997 Please be informed that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket. Please contact them again to refund your tickets.
@Tejas44309997 We kindly suggest you contact your agency directly regarding the issue.

@Tejas44309997 If you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency who issued the tickets and completed the payment in their system. And, the travel agency will coordinate with the airlines directly for this case. Sorry for the inconvenience.
@Tejas44309997 Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?

@rush2krrish @MoCA_GoI Due to the large volume of visitors, the waiting period may be slower than usual. We apologize for any inconvenience caused by this opportunity. The relevant departments will speed up the investigation and get back to you as soon as possible.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: The Martin Lewis Money Show
entity.description: Financial guru Martin Lewis presents this half-hour programme on which he provides ways for people to get the best deals for their money. Each episode acts as a masterclass that offers practical, money-saving tips for viewers. Angellica Bell puts Lewis' advice to use, using it to see if she can save money. The show sees Martin looking into difficulties for first-time buyers trying to get on the property ladder, rising energy prices, a range of high street offers, the financial toll of Christmas time and much more. Alongside co-host Angellica Bell, he'll also be hoping to cut through some of the current confusion answering viewers burning questions on how Brexit might impact on everything from holidays to the pound people's pockets.

data.text: @jfff__ Hello. If you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency. However, If you booked directly with https://t.co/mWPXQYhi4Q We suggest you get the link https://t.co/d1axd1fTyn for our options.
